name: Admission Type
description: Circumstances under which the patient was or will be admitted

values.definition: Patient admission due to accidental injury
Planned admission for non-urgent medical care
Unplanned admission requiring immediate medical attention
Admission for childbirth and obstetric care
Admission of newborn infant born in healthcare facility
Standard planned admission for routine care

notes: User-defined table allows customization for organization-specific admission workflows and policies
